Control Statement: The organization: a. Uses software and associated documentation in accordance with contract agreements and copyright laws;b. Tracks the use of software and associated documentation protected by quantity licenses to control copying and distribution; andc. Controls and documents the use of peer-to-peer file sharing technology to ensure that this capability is not used for the unauthorized distribution, display, performance, or reproduction of copyrighted work.
